title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant (KVCore Mastery)
job_overview:
We are looking for a highly skilled Real Estate Virtual Assistant with proven expertise in KVCore and strong experience in administrative support, marketing, transaction coordination, and client engagement. The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented, creative, and organized, with the ability to manage CRM systems, social media, and real estate transactions efficiently.

To apply make sure you attach as well your resume link. 

Key Responsibilities:
1. Administrative Support
-Manage and organize real estate leads through KVCore.
-Create and monitor drip campaigns to enhance follow-up and lead conversion.
-Provide regular reports detailing performance, lead flow, and system improvements.
-Support transaction coordination using SkySlope and Upgrade to see actual info to ensure compliance and timely documentation.
2. Marketing & Social Media
-Design and post engaging content (graphics & videos) for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, Snapchat, and YouTube.
-Run targeted ad campaigns on platforms like Facebook and Instagram to generate leads.
-Engage with followers through comments and DMs, using tools like ManyChat for automation where applicable.
3. Market Research & Analysis
-Utilize CRMLS to research market trends and provide data-driven insights.
-Perform competitive analysis of listings and marketing tactics to keep our brand competitive.
4. Client Relations
-Set up automated follow-up systems (email/SMS) to stay connected with clients and leads.
-Develop and manage onboarding processes to ensure a smooth experience for new clients.
5. Content Management
-Write blogs and articles for websites or social media (e.g., market updates, buyer tips).
-Edit and upload video content, such as property tours and educational videos for YouTube and social platforms.

To apply make sure you attach as well your resume link. 

Required Skills & Tools:
-KVCore: Expert-level CRM skills for campaign automation, lead tracking, and pipeline management.
-SkySlope & Upgrade to see actual info: Experience in managing transaction documents and ensuring compliance.
-CRMLS: Proficient in property search, data extraction, and market analysis.
-Social Media: Strong grasp of real estate content strategies across major platforms.
-Video Editing: Basic editing skills for creating short-form and long-form video content.
-Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
-Highly organized, tech-savvy, and self-motivated.
